learning_content.title: Starting with a subordinate clause
learning_content.content: German mein common hota hai ke sentence subordinate clause se shuru kiya jaye. Is case mein subordinate clause k finite verb k akhir mein hoti hai aur main clause ki finite verb uske clause ki front pe move hojati hai. Yani:   Kyun k wo Berlin ka ek dost rakhti hai, is liye wo german sikh rhi hai. (Weil sie einen Freund aus Berlin hat, lernt sie Deutsch).  Jab masalan jab wo bacha tha, wo bohot football khelta tha. (Als er ein Kind war, spielte er viel Fußball)  Ye dono finite verbs aik dusre k sath khari hoti hain aur in k beech comma hota hai.

learning_content.title: Conjunctions aur clauses – Main points
learning_content.content: Yahan kuch points yaad rakhne hain about conjunctions aur clauses:  • Agar aap do clauses link kar rahe hain und se aur subject dono mein same hai, to aapko doosre clause mein repeat karne ki zaroorat nahi.  • Denn aur weil dono ka matlab ‘because’ hota hai.  • Wenn aur als ka matlab thora german mein alag hota hai, lekin english inko differentiate nahi karti sirf ‘when’ use karti hai.  • Subordinate clause mein, finite verb hamesha akhir mein hoti hai.  • Aksar comma hota hai conjunctions se pehle jo introduce karte hain subordinate clause aur pehle aber aur denn.

learning_content.title: Jab aap dosray jumlay main mozo nakal sakty hain?
learning_content.content: Tab ap nay kuch bhi nahi nakalna hota. Isi tareeqay se aap doosray jumlay main sirf wo alfaz istemal kijye jin ki aap ko zaroorat ho aur baqiyan nakal kiye begair chor dain.

learning_content.title: Konse ataat aik matheeti jumlay ki ibtidaa karti hain?
learning_content.content: Is jumlay ki ibtidaa Ataat say hoti hai. Ataat yani wo lafz ya fraz jab istemal hota hai to jumlay ka matlab ya us ki samajh badal jati hai.

learning_content.title: Matheeti jumlay main muqarrar feal kia hota hai?
learning_content.content: Jab aap kisi feal ya kaam ki baat kartay hain jis kay barey main aap pehle say jaan rakhtay hain. Ya phir kisi aisi baat ki tasdiq kartey hain jis ka aap ko ilm ho. To esay feal ko muqarrar feal kehtay hain.

learning_content.title: Wenn aur Als ka matlab kia hota hai?
learning_content.content: 'Wenn' ka lafzi mana jab hota hai aur 'Als' ka lafzi mana 'Jaisa' hota hai. Dono alfaz apni jagah pe istemal hote hain.

learning_content.title: Denn aur Weil main farq kia hai?
learning_content.content: 'Denn' aur 'Weil' dono ka lafzi matlab 'Kyunki' hota hai. Lekin in dono alfazon ka istemal alag alag context main hota hai.

learning_content.title: Alfaz ka tarteeb
learning_content.content: English main alfaz ka tarteeb bohat sakhti se muqarar hai. Asal pattern yeh hota hai keh pehlay subject aata hai, phir verb aur uskay baad object ya digar elements (S–V–O).

learning_content.title: Position of the verb
learning_content.content: German ki sentences main verb ka position bohat aham hai. Agar sentence main do verb form hote hain to aik akhir main chala jata hai (infinitive ya participle), jabkeh doosra – finite verb – dosray number par rehta hai. Subordinate clauses main finite verb ko akhir main bheja jata hai.

learning_content.title: Time – Manner – Place
learning_content.content: Aik aur rule hai jo sentence ke mukhtalif elements ki sequencing se mutalliq hai. Time expressions hamesha manner (yani kisi kaam ko kaise kia jata hai) se pehle aate hain aur phir place (jagah) ki tafseelat aati hain.

learning_content.title: Verb ki Position
learning_content.content: German mein, basic rule ye hota hai k verb statement mein hamesha second position pe hoti hai. Aam taur pe, German ki basic pattern English jesi hoti hai: subject – verb – object ya koi or elements.

learning_content.title: German mein Flexibility
learning_content.content: German word order English se zyada flexible hai. Aap subject k ilawa kai elements ko first position pe rakh sakte hain. Time ya location k description ko first position pe rakhna aam baat hai.

learning_content.title: Subject–verb inversion
learning_content.content: Agar subject first position pe nahi hai, to wo verb k foran baad rakh diya jata hai. Is German grammar feature ko 'subject–verb inversion' kaha jata hai. English speakers k liye ye masla ban sakta hai, q k English sentence mein subject hamesha verb se pehle hota hai: ‘Next week we go to Italy with my parents.’ German mein, agar aap ne time expression ko first place pe rakha hai to finite verb hamesha subject se pehle ati hai.

learning_content.title: Sentence Starting with Other Words
learning_content.content:
Kisi sentence ko emphasize krnay k liye hum finite verb se pehle kisi dusri element ko rakh sakte hain.
Agar aap ye zaor dena chah rahay hain k aap apnay parents k sath Italy ja rahay hain kisi aur k sath nahi, to aap pehlay element mein ye daalain k aap k parents k sath ja rahay hain.

learning_content.title: Common Words or Expressions frequently used at start
learning_content.content:
Iss tarah kuch aur words ya phrases hain jo sentence k shuru mein istemaal hotay hain:
danach (jis k matlab hota hai agay), dann (jis k matlab hota hai phir), deswegen (jis k matlab hota hai isi liye), glücklicherweise (jis k matlab hota hai khushqismati se), leider (jis k matlab hota hai afsos se), manchmal (jis k matlab hota hai kabhi kabhi), zum Glück (jis k matlab hota hai khushqismati se).

learning_content.title: Two verbs in a Sentence
learning_content.content:
Ek sentence mein do verb forms bhi ho sakti hain. Agar yeh hota hai, to ek verb form – jo finite verb hota hai – dosray position mein jata hai, jab k dosra verb form (jo infinitive ya participle hota hai) clause k end mein hota hai.
German mein is principle ko Satzklammer ‘sentence bracket’ kaha jata hai, jo literal matlab hota hai k do verb forms sentence ko ‘bracket’ kartay hain.

learning_content.title: Petra aglay saal Australia chali jayegi
learning_content.content: Petra aglay saal Australia chali jayegi.

learning_content.title: Moajooda kamal tenses
learning_content.content:
Kal hum cinema gaye thay.
Unho ne mujhe aath baje phone kiya tha.

learning_content.title: Alag karnay wale verbs
learning_content.content: Bachay chuttiyon me televion ziada daikhtay hain.

learning_content.title: Haan ya na sawalat aur hukum
learning_content.content:
Kya tum kal mere saath cinema jaoge?
Kya tum mujhe ice cream khareedoge?

learning_content.title: Hukum
learning_content.content:
Mujhe kitab dedo!
Darwaza kholo!

learning_content.title: Matlooba jumlay se pehle mukammal jumla
learning_content.content:
Agar tum kal aoge, tum mujhe madad kar saktay ho.
Kyun ke usay dil nahi tha, wo cinema nahi gaya.

learning_content.title: Subordinating Clauses: Finite Verb Position
learning_content.content: Zar Talibon mai bhi fikar verb akhir mein hoti hai. Lekin, yahan qanoon thora mukhtalif hai. Zar talibon mein yeh qanoon nahi lagu hota keh fikar verb ko dosra position pr hona chahye. Bajaye eske, wo clause ke akhir mein jati hai. Zar talibon ko 'weil', 'wenn', 'dass', wagairah jaisay zarbaton se shuru kiya jata hai.

learning_content.title: Zayada se Zayada Verbs in Subordinating Clauses
learning_content.content:
German mai aik bohat mash'hoor qanoon hai, wo hai verbs shape talay jama karne ka qanoon. Yeh waqia, jab aap perfect tense ya modal verb use kar rahe hain, zar talibon ke akhir mai hota hai.

Clause ke end mai verbs ki tarteeb ka rule bohat asan hai: verb ke sath verb ending – jo keh finite verb hai - clause ke akhir pr rakhein.

learning_content.title: Aik Sentence ko Subordinating clause ke sath Shuru Karna
learning_content.content:
Yeh bhi mumkin hai keh aik sentence ko aik zar taliyah ke sath shuru kiya jaye. Jaisa ke aap umeed kar rahe honge, zar taliyah ke fikar verb uske taliyah ke akhir mai jati hai, magar fikar verb mukhya taliyah mai apne taliyah ke aglay pr chali jati hai.

Do fikar verbs ek doosre ke bagal mein hoti hain, jo keh aik comma se alag hoti hain.

learning_content.title: Waqt, Tareeka, Jagah
learning_content.content: Jaisa keh hum nay pehlay dekha, waqt ya jagah ya kisi bhi dosray element ka izhar aasani say sentence ke pehli position mein ho sakta hai agar aap kisi khas item par zyada tawajjo dena chahtay hain.

learning_content.title: Bunyadi Usool
learning_content.content:
Magar, wahan kuch guidelines hain jinhay verb kay baad anay walay elements follow kartay hain. Aam taur par woh is tarteeb ko follow kartay hain:

- Waqt (kab?)
- Tareeka (kesay?)
- Jagah (kahan/kahan tak?)

Waqt - Tareeka - Jagah kay rule ke mutabik, waqt ka description baaki do elements say pehlay ana chahiye.

learning_content.title: Dosray combinations
learning_content.content: Aksar teeno elements maujood nahi hotay. Magar, baqi items ki tarteeb Waqt - Tareeka - Jagah kay usool ko follow karti chahiye:

learning_content.title: Mozu-verb inversion
learning_content.content: Agar koi element pehli position par ata hai, tu subject - verb inversion (finite verb kay baad subject anay ka rule) apply karnay na bhulen:

learning_content.title: Exercise 28.4
learning_content.content:
Mutarjam keejiye mandarja zail sentences ko:

  1. Main tumhein phone karunga jab main tayyar hojao.
  2. Usay ghar jana chahiye kyun ke bohat der hogayi hai.
  3. London aik dilchasp shehar hai haalaanke yeh bohat mehnga hai.
  4. Main bus se jana chahta tha kyun ke yeh sasta hai.
  5. Haalan ke uski maa Germany se hai, lekin usko koi German zubaan nahi aati.
  6. Kyun ke Munich bohat khubsurat hai, bohat se log wahan rehna chahte hain.
  7. Jab mere pass ziyada waqt hoga main aik saal Austria ya Germany mein guzarunga.

learning_content.title: Checklist
learning_content.content:
German ka lafzi tarteeb kafi flexible hai, lekin aam taur par aap ko doosre position par kia milta hai?

Panj mausam batayen jo aik matahet jumle ka aghaz kar sakte hain.

Aap ka mozoo-al-feal kis wakt ulta hota hai?

Farme me kis rule ka amal hota hai?

Kya aap jis mein bataya jata hai ke kahan, kaise ya kab kuch hua hai us ka koi khas tarteeb hai?

Konsi suraten hoti hain jin mein aap ko aik se ziyada mukammal feal aik saath milte hain?

learning_content.title: UNIT 1 Checklist
learning_content.content:
• Aap sentences shuru mein aur tamam nouns ke liye capital letters use karte hain.
  • Umlauts mehtab hona zaroori hain kyun k inhon ne lafzon ki pronunciation aur ma`ni ko badal dia.
  • English gender biological hota hai (log mard ya aurat hotay hain, aur cheezein, concepts aur ideas neuter hotay hain). German gender grammatical hota hai (cheezen mardana, zanana ya neuter ho sakti hain).
  • Verbs badalti hain: ich gehe ya sie gehen. Articles badaltay hain, for example jab noun sentence ka object hota hai. Adjectives noun ke mutabiq badalti hain.
  • Verb ka position.
  • Nahi, sirf ek tense hai.
